name: ReplaceInFilesTextByText
friendlyName: Replace In Files Text By Text
description: Search for a string in the Source Files and replace the content by another content.
author: Samayas
instanceNameFormat: Replace In Files Text By Text

inputs.name: parameterSearchDirectory
inputs.label: Search Directory to look through
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a Directory to search through.

inputs.name: parameterSearchText
inputs.label: Search For Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a string to search for.

inputs.name: parameterReplaceText
inputs.label: Replace With Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the text to replace with. (When empty the search for string will be removed)

inputs.name: parameterTypeOfSearch
inputs.label: Choose the Type of Search
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose between Search Pattern and List of Files.

inputs.name: parameterFilesPattern
inputs.label: Files Search Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a search pattern for looking for files ex. *.cs, MyFile.cs.

inputs.name: parameterFilesList
inputs.label: List of Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a list of files that wil be prepended by source Directory
